articles.title: Russia's war in Ukraine: Live updates
articles.description: The Ukrainian military's defense in the eastern region is growing more difficult as Russia continues to target the Azot chemical plant in Severodonetsk, where 500 civilians are said to be sheltering. Follow live updates here.

articles.author: Nectar Gan, Brad Lendon, and CNN's Beijing bureau
articles.title: China launches third, most advanced aircraft carrier named 'Fujian'
articles.description: China on Friday launched its third and most advanced aircraft carrier from Shanghai's Jiangnan Shipyard, with a new launch system that experts say is fast catching up with the United States.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez and Brandon Miller, CNN
articles.title: The West just experienced an aspect of the climate crisis that scientists have warned of for years
articles.description: Drought conditions persisted in the Southwest, where water is desperately needed to replenish the country's largest reservoirs relied on by tens of millions of people.

articles.title: New satellite imagery shows flooding in Yellowstone altered the river's course
articles.description: A vital bridge and road along the Yellowstone River and its tributary, the Gardner River, were destroyed by recent historic flooding. New satellite images from Maxar Technologies show the extent of the damage the torrent of water wrought.

articles.author: Rebekah Riess, CNN
articles.title: At least 2,000 cattle deaths reported due to heat, humidity in southwest Kansas
articles.description: At least 2,000 cattle deaths occurred in the southwestern part of Kansas as high temperatures, humidity, and low winds made it difficult for the cows to stay cool, Kansas Department of Health and Environment Communications Director, Matt Lara, told CNN.

articles.title: A break from the record heat is coming, but it won't last long
articles.description: More than 65 million people in over a dozen states are under heat alerts Thursday. From the Ohio and Mississippi Valleys to the Southeast, temperatures will be in the upper 90s, with heat index levels well into the triple digits.

articles.author: Stella Chan, CNN
articles.title: Death Valley National Park visitor found dead after walking for gas, say park officials
articles.description: A Death Valley National Park tourist was found dead Tuesday after his car ran out of gas, the National Park Service (NPS) reports.

articles.title: What caused Yellowstone's 'unprecedented' flooding? Scientists saw it coming
